Name: Ezaron Defense
About the game: When the Rift opened up, magic slipped into the world and with it, terrifying creatures with devastating powers. Fight with hoarders of dark creatures, customizing your defensive strategy with different tower upgrades and specializations! In this Tower Defense game you have four basic towers, that can be further upgraded to more specialized ones. Customize them towers with up to 20 special abilities: Poison and Fire Arrows, Missiles and Bombs, Electricity and Arcane Magic, and many more. With over 50 upgrades and a mighty arsenal of magic spells, there is no end to the many strategies and choices available at your disposal!
